install.name: Content - Nox Tube
install.author: Noxidsoft
install.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
install.description: This content plugin modifies a Youtube URL on the fly to import a static image and create a link utlizing RocketTheme's RokBox plugin. Usage {loadtube videoTagNumber} i.e. {loadtube LksuKTD8y0o}

param.name: imageWidth
param.label: Thumb Width
param.description: Enter a width value for the thumb e.g. 100px or 60% or 2em

param.name: imageHeight
param.label: Thumb Height
param.description: Enter a height value for the thumb e.g. 100px or 60% or 2em
